This weapon is empowered with freezing ice. It deals an additional 1d6 cold damage on a successful Strike. On a critical hit, the target is also [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) 1 until the end of your next turn unless it succeeds at a DC 24 Fortitude save.
